thread.title: Dawn Crane
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Dawn Crane

author: Dawn Crane
title: Dawn Crane
text: Even though I ordered the wrong size mat, I was given a discount for the reorder of the correct size. Only had to pay for shipping costs! Love how the matboard looks in the frame displaying my children's high school graduation photos. Will recommend matboardandmore.com to my friends and family. Great turnaround time as well!
